category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_dwg_save_aux_for_details_sheets
preference.preference_description: Set the CATIA_dwg_save_aux_for_details_sheets variable to true to save auxiliary files corresponding to Detail Sheets to Teamcenter. Set this variable to false to prevent auxiliary files corresponding to Detail Sheets from being saved to Teamcenter.
